SEARCH
Package fr.istic.aco.editor.ClassImpl

Class Invoker

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.ClassImpl.Invoker
public class Invoker extends Object
The Invoker class acts as an intermediary between the user and the command objects. It initializes and stores different commands in a map and provides methods to execute them. This class also manages the text insertion and selection indices.
